Title: Authorizes industrial development agencies to provide assistance to qualified residential facilities
Summary: Authorizes industrial development agencies to provide technical and financial assistance to qualified residential facilities; "qualified residential facility" shall mean any multi-family residential facility with units that are for sale, in any municipality located within the county of Westchester, and which is located in an urban renewal area.
LawCode: Amd ยง854, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to authorizing industrial development agencies to provide assistance to qualified residential facilities
